headers.subject: [tosdr:2540] Instagram class action waiver

html:
You may bring claims only on your own behalf. Neither you nor Instagram will participate in a class action or class-wide arbitration for any claims covered by this agreement. You also agree not to participate in claims brought in a private attorney general or representative capacity, or consolidated claims involving another person's account, if Instagram is a party to the proceeding.

http://instagram.com/about/legal/terms/

Title: You waive your right to a class action

Topic: waiver

Summary: By agreeing to Instagram's terms, you agree that you can only bring any claim against them on your own behalf. You waive your right to being part of a class action, or participating in claims brought in any representative capacity.

Score: 40 (mediocre)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
